title: Sweetcorn cakes with avocado salsa
description: The spice of red chillies is mellowed out by avocado salsa in this wonderful vegetarian canapé recipe.
ingredients: Handful fresh coriander, plus extra sprigs, for garnishing
2 red chillies, deseeded and finely chopped
1 ripe avocado, stone removed and diced
½ red onion or 1 shallot, finely diced

method.Step 1: Place the flour in a food processor with the egg, baking powder, half the coriander and half the corn. Whizz briefly, then stir in half the chilli and the remaining corn. Heat the oil in a large, non-stick frying pan and drop in teaspoonfuls of the corn mixture. Fry for 1 minute each side, until golden, then drain on kitchen paper while you cook the rest.

method.Step 2: Combine the avocado, remaining chilli and coriander, onion, lime juice and some seasoning together in a bowl.

method.Step 3: Arrange the corn cakes on platters and top each with a scant teaspoonful of salsa. Garnish each one with a sprig of coriander and serve immediately.
